mysummer.chat.ui.selectConversation: Select a conversation to start chatting
mysummer.messages.welcome.subject: Welcome to West Coast
mysummer.messages.welcome.body1: Welcome to West Coast USA! Your ETK I-Series project car is waiting at your garage.
mysummer.messages.welcome.body2: Check SpeedParts.com for new parts, PartsBay for used parts, and your computer for updates. Good luck!
mysummer.messages.ghostIntro.line1: You don't know me. But I know you.
mysummer.messages.ghostIntro.line2: Saw you picking up parts for that ETK project. Word travels fast in certain circles.
mysummer.messages.ghostIntro.line3: If you want the REAL parts - the ones that actually make a difference - you're shopping at the wrong places.
mysummer.messages.ghostIntro.line4: There's a place on the deep web. Silk Road. That's where the serious builders go. Look for someone called 'Ghost'.
